subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
B . tarsalis : Istituto Sperimentale
per la Zoologia Agraria, Firenze, Italy ; of
T . tineivorus
: not stated; of
B . triodons
: United States National Museum, Washington DC, USA ; of
L . similis
: not stated.

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
B . tarsalis : Firenze
, Italy , in rotten grass in a stable; of
T . tineivorus : Urbana
, Illinois, USA , from a colony of
Sitotroga cerealella
[Animalia: Gelechiidae ]; of
B . triodons : Fort Omaha
, Nebraska, USA , in debris in cages housing a colony of German cockroaches,
Blattella germanica
[Animalia: Blattellidae ]; of
L . similis : Manaders, Swiss
National Park, Switzerland , in spring bottom.
